Privacy Policy Things Remembered Store Review–Recommended Store For Personalized Gifts For Every Occasion And Need! By Upstate4124
For this Valentine’s Day, I wanted to get something special and different for my girlfriend. We have been dating for a couple of years now and I have bought her jewelry and the normal gifts, but this year I wanted to be different. I decided to go into my local mall and go to Things Remembered.
As I looked around I was really impressed with all the selection they have that you can personalize. As I looked around I knew that this would be something special I could do that would be different and out of the normal gifts I buy year after year. I had thought that I could do a picture frame that could have a picture of us and also had a personalized message in the heart that was attached to the frame.

Once I had selected a picture fram I liked, I then had a associate help me fill out the order form. The form was easy to fill out and it was easy to customize the frame to my liking. They have options such as colored writing, symbols, and the choice of font/style. I had chosen a short saying that was 3 words long and then i had the date of Valentine’s Day underneath the saying.
Your Ad Here
When the associate had rung up the order she had told me the title and I was shocked at the amount because I had little engraving done. Things Remembered charges $3 per word and then a flat $6 for the date. I didn’t have it colored because they told me that the writing was too small to fit in the space that was allotted.
When I returned the next day to pick up the frame, I was really happy the way it came out. I guess in the end it is worth the pricey prices if it is something special. Another great thing was I would have been able to pick up my order later on the day I placed the order, but I had to be somewhere else that evening.

I was really happy with the entire experience. The customer service was really good and the associate actually made good suggestions to me. I would recommend Thing Remembered to anyone that wants to create a really special gift for any holiday, special day, or any need. The products are well made and the engraving is amazing when finished!
